About Us

We at R.K Engineering have been in the fast and effcient production of quality products over the years. We have continued to e arn excellent reputation for efficient production of quality and machined products and we will continue to improve our capabilities. Our desire to capture cutting edge technology have helped to set new industry standards. The Unit is Headed by qualified & highly experienced mechanical engineer, having 44 years of experience in manufacturing & designing of various components of Tractor Engines, Harvester Combines & Automotive; was associated with Eicher Tractor, Swaraj Mazda & Jay Bharat Maruti Limited.

Raw Material Source - From our Sister Concern having Forging & Gear Cutting Facilities at plant located nearby us.

); } export default About;
